entities.entity: RMAR AGE WHEN FIRST 2+ WK PERIOD OF TIME STARTED
entities.description: The age reported by the respondent when they first experienced a 2-week period of depression.

entities.entity: # TIMES FELT THIS WAY FOR 2 WKS/LNGR DURING LIFE
entities.description: The number of times in the respondent's life they felt a depressive episode lasting 2 weeks or longer.

entities.entity: FELT THIS 2 WKS+ W/OTH PRBS DURING PAST 12 MOS
entities.description: Whether the respondent had a depressive episode lasting 2 weeks or more in the past 12 months along with other problems.

relationships.target_entity: RMAR AGE WHEN FIRST 2+ WK PERIOD OF TIME STARTED
relationships.description: The age at which the respondent first experienced a 2-week period of depression.

relationships.target_entity: # TIMES FELT THIS WAY FOR 2 WKS/LNGR DURING LIFE
relationships.description: The total number of times the respondent experienced a depressive episode lasting 2 weeks or longer in their lifetime.

relationships.target_entity: FELT THIS 2 WKS+ W/OTH PRBS DURING PAST 12 MOS
relationships.description: Whether the respondent had a depressive episode for 2 weeks or more along with other problems during the past 12 months.
